abstract: The American Society of Composers, Authors and Publishers said that it had filed copyright suits against 21 bars, nightclubs and restaurants across the country, from Doug’s Burger Bar in Imperial, Mo., to The Vibe in Riverside, Calif.
snippet: The American Society of Composers, Authors and Publishers said that it had filed copyright suits against 21 bars, nightclubs and restaurants across the country, from Doug’s Burger Bar in Imperial, Mo., to The Vibe in Riverside, Calif.
lead_paragraph: The American Society of Composers, Authors and Publishers said on Monday that it had filed copyright suits against 21 bars, nightclubs and restaurants across the country, including Doug’s Burger Bar in Imperial, Mo., and The Vibe in Riverside, Calif.

headline.main: ASCAP Files 21 Copyright Suits Against Bars and Clubs
